description:
Keep your feet protected and warm with these split-toe reef boots. The 1mm thick neoprene helps protect you from reef cuts and cold water. Perfect for tropical waters of 18˚C and warmer.

  • 1mm neoprene provides protection and comfort
  • Toggle closure at the top to get them snug
  • Instep hook-and-loop strap provides a secure fit
  • Contoured fit through the heel and instep for comfort
  • Hidden seams are taped for added durability
  • Single-layer rubber sole is durable and helps you feel your board underfoot
name: Xcel Infiniti Split Toe 1mm Reef Neoprene Boots - Unisex
